terms_intro: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of [COMPANY_NAME]'s Website, located at [WEBSITE_URL].
terms_acceptance: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use [WEBSITE_URL] if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
cookies_explanation: We employ the use of cookies. By accessing [WEBSITE_URL], you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the [COMPANY_NAME]'s Privacy Policy.

All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from [WEBSITE_URL] for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.
privacy_intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and handle your personal information.
data_collection_explanation: We collect information that you provide directly to us when using our services.
contact_information: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [CONTACT_EMAIL].
